author: Tom Byrne
description: Cognac provides the French influence and golden rum the sunny warmth with flavours of apricot, honey and lemon.
name: French Riviera
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
